text: The Men's 100 metre backstroke competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 14 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Ryan Murphy||align=left|||align=left|51.85||Rio de Janeiro||13 August 2016 |- |African record||align=left|Christopher Reid||align=left|||align=left|53.12||Durban||11 April 2016 |- |Championship record||align=left|Darren Murray||align=left|||align=left|55.67||Casablanca||17 September 2010 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
